amendment.description: To require a report on a USAID mission in Sierra Leone.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2007 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2007 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S13366-13367; text: CR S13366-13367) To require a report on a USAID mission in Sierra Leone.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2007 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2007 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Feingold.
